function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Public support for action on climate change at all-time high prior to covid-19","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of increased decentralization of energy governance from multilateral to national, transnational, and local scales due to the frailty of global cooperation and the impact of covid-19.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased government intervention in markets and private life due to the response to the pandemic, leading to potential disruptions in economic and institutional capacities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of sufficient policies and regulatory frameworks","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Division within the eu regarding energy transition","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Backtracking of major players on national level commitments","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordinated and inclusive global energy governance","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variability in green stimulus policies across countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exacerbated trends towards ’re-shoring’ and localization of energy systems","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term focus on health and livelihoods without considering long-term health and environmental impacts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on fossil fuels despite evidence of superior economic returns from sustainable initiatives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate support for cleantech market progress and green energy initiatives","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to large-scale economic activities and investment flows","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate allocation of resources towards public health infrastructure and pandemic preparedness","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Discontinuity in investment flows impacting healthcare infrastructure and disease prevention initiatives","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High oil and gas prices and volatility resulting from cuts in investment","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial practices supporting fossil fuel industries and investments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in fids in lng industry leading to economic impact","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Plummeting production and rig count in the us shale industry","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential peak fossil fuel demand and demise of fossil fuels accelerated by covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on global supply chains for healthcare products and appliances","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Vulnerability of critical energy industries to supply chain disruptions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction in energy investment due to the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fall in energy demand, especially for oil","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Constrained global production of liquefied natural gas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains for energy production facilities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on pace and nature of whole energy system change","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical price crashes and demand shocks leaving marks on global energy system","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainties about the structure of global energy system in 2030 due to pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases due to changes in social practices and public movements.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-technical lock-ins leading to limited flexibility in transitioning to sustainable energy practices.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Policy responses to the covid-19 pandemic influencing the pace of sustainable energy transitions.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex sociotechnical processes of decarbonisation within energy systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequity and energy poverty","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Political approaches to sustainability","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid return to high levels of emissions and urban air pollution after crisis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Short-term survival strategies supporting business-as-usual","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social impacts shaping the politics of sustainable energy transitions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global economy predicted to shrink by 6% in 2020 with 300 million job losses","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant variance in economic impacts across sectors and countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in global co2 emissions due to pandemic-related changes in social practices and energy use","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic as a global health crisis","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in global greenhouse gas emissions","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impact of pandemic on sustainable energy transitions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on built environment measures to mitigate contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of public awareness and political implication in disease prevention","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overreliance on scientific evidence without public awareness and political commitment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 through commuting, tourists, and businesspeople","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health inequities derived from urban development","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of environmental impacts on zoonosis and deforestation","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
